parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Plays given sound in 2D

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> from [[say2D]] sound

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> from: [[Object]] - origin of the sound
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> sound: [[String]] - classname of the sound to be played. Defined in CfgSounds including [[Description.ext]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2 </name>=<value> from [[say2D]] [sound, maxTitlesDistance, speed]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> from: [[Object]] - origin of the sound
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [sound, maxTitlesDistance, speed]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> sound: [[String]] - classname of the sound to be played. Defined in CfgSounds including [[Description.ext]]
</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> maxTitlesDistance: [[Number]] - max distance at which the sound can be heard. Default: 100 m. 
</value></part><part><name>p25</name>=<value> speed (Optional): [[Number]] - pitch of the sound. Default: 1.

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s3</name>=<value> [from, to] [[say2D]] sound

</value></part><part><name>p41</name>=<value> [from, to]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p42</name>=<value> from: [[Object]] - origin of the sound
</value></part><part><name>p43</name>=<value> to: [[Object]] - target
</value></part><part><name>p44</name>=<value> sound: [[String]] - classname of the sound to be played. Defined in CfgSounds including [[Description.ext]]

</value></part><part><name> r3</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s4 </name>=<value> [from, to] [[say2D]] [sound, maxTitlesDistance, speed]

</value></part><part><name>p61</name>=<value> [from, to]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p62</name>=<value> from: [[Object]] - origin of the sound
</value></part><part><name>p63</name>=<value> to: [[Object]] - target
</value></part><part><name>p64</name>=<value> [sound, maxTitlesDistance, speed]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p65</name>=<value> sound: [[String]] - classname of the sound to be played. Defined in CfgSounds including [[Description.ext]]
</value></part><part><name>p66</name>=<value> maxTitlesDistance: [[Number]] - max distance at which the sound can be heard. Default: 100 m. 
</value></part><part><name>p67</name>=<value> speed (Optional): [[Number]] - pitch of the sound. Default: 1.

</value></part><part><name> r4</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[say2D]] "HelloThere";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code><ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[player]], _officer] [[say2D]] ["HelloThere", 50, 0.9];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[say]], [[say3D]], [[playSound]], [[createSoundSource]]
</value></part></template>
